p: 86.7% of all herbalists were female, and aged between 61 and 70 years of age (43.3%) (Table 1). The average age of the female herbalist was 61.6 years while the average age of their male counterparts was 51.5 years of age. Seventeen of the herbalists (56.7%) had no formal education while only 1 had secondary education (Table 1). It was observed that both male and female herbalists had extensive years of practice. The mean years of practice for male and female herbalists in the study area were 27 years and 25 years for male and female herbalists respectively.
